Method Detail

addRight

public BaseRight addRight(java.lang.String groupName,
                          java.lang.String rightName)
                   throws DuplicateNameException
Specified by:
addRight in interface IPermissionRightsAPI
Parameters:
groupName - is the name of the group to be created, in-case the group is present then the right will be appended to the existing group.
rightName - is the name of the right which is required to be added
Returns:
newly created BaseRight object
Throws:
DuplicateNameException - in-case the rightName is exists for the same group
